title: MacBook Pro
summary: The MacBook Pro is a line of Macintosh notebook computers introduced in January 2006 by Apple Inc. It is the higher-end model of the MacBook family, sitting above the consumer-focused MacBook Air, and is currently sold with 13-inch, 14-inch, and 16-inch screens. All current models of the MacBook Pro use variants of the Apple-designed M1 system on a chip.
